text: "Lighthouse" is a song by the Swedish acoustic duo Hearts & Colors (Philip Tillström and Nicolai Kjellberg). It was co-written by Sam Ellis and was first released on their YouTube account in April and was included on their first EP, Prologue, also as an acoustic version. ==Andrelli remix== The song achieved greater success when it was remixed by Andrelli. This version was released on 11 November 2016 and charted in Sweden, Norway, and also reached the Ultratip chart in Belgium (in both Flanders and Wallonia). ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Norway (VG-lista) | 10 |- |- ! scope="row"| Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) | 28 |} == Certifications == ==References== Category:2016 songs Category:2016 singles Category:Songs written by Sam Ellis (songwriter)
title: Lighthouse (Hearts & Colors song)
